NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.label: Net Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAva.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from continuing operations available to common shareholders.

NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.label: Net Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations Available to Common Shareholders, Basic
NetIncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsA.description: Amount, after deduction of tax, noncontrolling interests, dividends on preferred stock and participating securities; of income (loss) from discontinued operations available to common shareholders.

DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssetsP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Period Increase (Decrease)
DefinedBenefitPlanFairValueOfPlanAssetsP.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness.

ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
ProceedsFromDivestitureOfBusinesses.description: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAsse.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Increase (Decrease) for Actual Return (Loss)
DefinedBenefitPlanActualReturnOnPlanAsse.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in plan assets of defined benefit plan from actual return (loss) determined by change in fair value of plan assets adjusted for contributions, benefit payments, and other expenses.

TradingLiabilities.label: Trading Liabilities
TradingLiabilities.description: The carrying amount of liabilities as of the balance sheet date that pertain to principal and customer trading transactions, or which may be incurred with the objective of generating a profit from short-term fluctuations in price as part of an entity's market-making, hedging and proprietary trading. Examples include short positions in securities, derivatives and commodities, obligations under repurchase agreements, and securities borrowed arrangements.

SecuritiesBorrowedCollateralObligationTo.label: Securities Borrowed, Collateral, Obligation to Return Securities
SecuritiesBorrowedCollateralObligationTo.description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities borrowed.

SecuritiesBorrowedGross.label: Securities Borrowed, Gross
SecuritiesBorrowedGross.description: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of securities borrowed from entities in exchange for collateral. Includes assets elected not to be offset. Excludes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement.

SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.label: Securities Purchased under Agreements to Resell, Collateral, Obligation to Return Securities
SecuritiesPurchasedUnderAgreementsToRese.description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against securities purchased under agreement to resell.

SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.label: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Amount Offset Against Collateral
SecuritiesSoldUnderAgreementsToRepurchas.description: Amount, after effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price offset against a right to receive collateral. Includes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.
